summary: Email correspondence from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center to Rebekah, inquiring about access to Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration records from Florida following his death. The email reveals the prosecution team has been walled off from the investigation and seeks contacts at the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office and the U.S. Attorney's Office in Florida.

persons.name: Rebekah
persons.context: Addressed in an email from a Supervisory Staff Attorney seeking information about Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration records.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC
persons.role: Supervisory Staff Attorney at New York Metropolitan Correctional Center
persons.context: Author of the email inquiring about access to Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration records from Florida and noting the prosecution team has been walled off from the investigation.

connections.description: Email correspondence regarding accessing Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration records.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Inquiry into Epstein's prior incarceration records
events.description: A Supervisory Staff Attorney emails Rebekah seeking access to Jeffrey Epstein's records from his prior incarceration in Florida.

locations: Palm Beach County Sheriffs Office Violent Crimes Division / Homicide
keyFacts: The prosecution team investigating Jeffrey Epstein's death had been 'walled off' from the investigation, indicating potential internal restrictions or conflicts.
A Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center was actively seeking Epstein's prior incarceration records from Florida shortly after his death.
The Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office Violent Crimes Division/Homicide was identified as a contact for information regarding Epstein's prior case.
The email correspondence occurred on August 13, 2019, just days after Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
